Account Settings

Username: {{ currentUser.username }}

Email: {{ currentUser.email }}

Two-Factor Authentication

Loading...
{{ twoFactorEnabled ? 'Enabled' : 'Disabled' }}

{{ twoFactorEnabled ? 'Your account is protected with two-factor authentication.' : 'Secure your account by enabling two-factor authentication.' }}

Set up Two-Factor Authentication

Step 1: Scan QR Code

Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.):

Step 2: Manual Entry (Optional)

If you can't scan the QR code, enter this key manually:

{{ setupData.manualEntryKey }}
Step 3: Verify Setup

Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app:

Code is required
Please enter a valid 6-digit code

Important: Save Your Recovery Codes

These recovery codes can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. Save them in a secure location - they won't be shown again.

{{ code }}
